document.discussion_title: Torc Oil And Gas Ltd (TSE:TOG) Receives C$8.61 Average PT from Brokerages
document.topic_text: Tweet Shares of Torc Oil And Gas Ltd (TSE:TOG) have received an average recommendation of “Buy” from the thirteen brokerages that are presently covering the company. One investment analyst has rated the stock with a hold rating and nine have issued a buy rating on the company. The average 1-year price objective among brokers that have covered the stock in the last year is C$8.61. Several brokerages have recently issued reports on TOG. Canaccord Genuity cut their price target on Torc Oil And Gas from C$10.00 to C$9.00 in a research note on Monday, May 2nd. Dundee Securities lowered Torc Oil And Gas from a “buy” rating to a “neutral” rating in a research note on Tuesday, August 9th. TD Securities reaffirmed a “buy” rating and set a C$10.50 price target on shares of Torc Oil And Gas in a research note on Wednesday, August 17th. Scotiabank cut their price target on Torc Oil And Gas from C$10.25 to C$9.75 and set an “outperform”rating on the stock in a research note on Wednesday, August 17th. Finally, Royal Bank Of Canada upped their price target on Torc Oil And Gas from C$9.00 to C$10.00 and gave the company an “outperform” rating in a research note on Thursday, May 12th. Shares of Torc Oil And Gas ( TSE:TOG ) opened at 8.40 on Friday. The firm’s market capitalization is $1.37 billion. The stock’s 50 day moving average price is $7.73 and its 200 day moving average price is $7.58. Torc Oil And Gas has a one year low of $3.71 and a one year high of $9.23. In other Torc Oil And Gas news, insider Michael Wihak sold 15,000 shares of the stock in a transaction dated Tuesday, June 7th. The stock was sold at an average price of C$8.81, for a total value of C$132,150.00. TORC Oil and Gas Ltd. (TORC), formerly Vero Energy Inc (Vero), is a Canada-based company. The Company is engaged in the acquisition, exploration, development and production of crude oil and natural gas assets.The Company is engaged in drilling activities. TORC uses its technical, technological and industry knowledge to evaluate potential hydrocarbon . Torc Oil And Gas Ltd Torc Oil And Gas Ltd
